programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Shocked by her task, Daya tries her best to prevent herself from dancing. However, she fails to do so and begins to do 'garba'.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya panics when she hears that Sundarlal has gone missing. Soon, she tells Nattu Kaka to get her tickets to Ahmedabad.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tries to find Sundarlal by calling his friends. However, Sundarlal seems to have vanished without a trace.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya finds Sundarlal at the airport and takes him home. However, Sundarlal tells Daya and Anjali not to let anyone know he has arrived at the society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is conflicted when Jethalal forces her to choose between himself and Sundarlal. Later, Daya enlists Tapu's help to sneak Sundarlal around.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is nervous about Jethalal finding Sundarlal hidden in their house. Later, Jethalal becomes suspicious when Daya is eager for him to leave.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal catches a peek of Sundarlal in his kitchen and assumes it is a burglar. Soon, the rest of Gokuldham Society panics and begins searching for the supposed criminal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Zorawar is on the lookout for Sundarlal and hunts all over the society. However, Sundarlal dresses up as a housemaid to evade capture.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundarlal dresses up as a woman to disguise himself. However, chaos ensues when the other residents assume Sundarlal is Popatlal's girlfriend.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Holi celebrations continue in full swing. Meanwhile, Zorawar and his men hunt for Sundarlal all over Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Champaklal's feet hurt, Jethalal and Tapu fight over helping him. Later, Jethalal feels embarrassed in front of Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal's phone stops functioning and he tries various techniques to fix the problem. Later, he decides to purchase a smartphone from Jethalal's store.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is keen on buying his new phone as per the auspicious time given by the priest. At the shop, he harasses Jethalal a lot over selecting the phone.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Dr Salunkhe manages to save Daya's life by performing an emergency medical procedure. Later, the CID team finds a dead body inside the vault and discover an entrance to a long tunnel.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Sanjana is asked to surrender the mysterious briefcase because of which she was kidnapped. Meanwhile, Daya manages to save Abhijeet in the nick of time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A dejected Jethalal plans to take his family to Lonavala when Babita does not invite him to her birthday party. But when Babita learns the truth she confronts Iyer about the error.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya excitedly rush to get the perfect gift for Babita's birthday party. On the other hand, Babita and Iyer's grand party begins in full swing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya reach right on time for Babita's bash and learn that they failed to get the perfect gift for her. Later, Champaklal attends the party and feels horrified to find Daya in a dress.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is happy to finally be out of jail and have his name cleared in the gold case. Later, he visits each of his friends to thank them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is unable to come up with a thoughtful quote to write on the public chalkboard. Later, Champaklal comes by and suggests a great thought for him to use.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha interrupts Jethalal in his signature way as he enjoys his cup of tea in the morning. Just then, Bawri rushes into the shop to talk to him about an important matter.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal learns that Jethalal wants to go to Sanghvi's birthday party and scolds him for desiring to leave his family to stay out late at night.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal humiliates Jethalal in public for coming home late. Later, Jethalal begins to resent him for overreacting to a small mistake.

programme.desc: Comedian Kapil Sharma interacts with celebrity guests about their latest films while keeping the audience laughing with his wit, humour and assorted skits.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Host Kapil Sharma invites two of the most celebrated female actresses of the 20th century, Moushumi Chatterjee and Reena Roy, to enjoy a fun-filled banter with his comic troupes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: All of the members go on a trip to visit Mumbai's famous Shree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Temple. Meanwhile, Bhide announces a surprise that he plans for everyone. He also apologises for the day before.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The members of the society return home to another surprise from Bhide. However, a new problem suddenly arises.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Panic arrives when Jethalal loses his house key, and everyone in the society helps him find the key. All of the members are tired, but they still cannot find the keys.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tappu Sena and Gokuldham members plan to celebrate Popatlal's birthday. The office colleagues of Popatlal ask him to give a party, but he takes leave.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal envisions receiving wishes for marriage during his birthday celebration, but then decides to avoid the celebration and everyone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Despite all of Tapu Sena's efforts, Popatlal is determined to spend his birthday alone. Popatlal hears everyone talking about an important issue.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide tries to get in touch with Popatlal through the society board. However, Popatlal is unreachable.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak tries to find Popatlal by talking to his boss. The Gokuldham residents realise there is more to Popatlal's absence than meets the eye.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Abdul helps Popatlal get dressed as a woman to fake his identity as a plan to expose a merchant, who sells low quality products.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is awe-struck to find himself at his surprise birthday party organised by his colleagues and Gokuldham residents.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Dr Hathi arrives in a tempo and is unable to get off of it. Babita gets excited about her birthday but is disappointed when Iyer cannot celebrate with her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Babita learns that Iyer and all her loved ones are busy on her birthday, she feels upset. Jethalal rushes to get a nice present for Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal learns it is Babita's birthday and arrives at her house to wish her, but he accidentally leaks Iyer's surprise plans for her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal rushes to learn western dance forms when he learns about Babita's birthday party. Daya feels devastated when the ladies of Gokuldham inform her about the party's invitation card.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Babita's western birthday party approaches, the residents of Gokuldham Society begin preparing for the big day.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A dejected Jethalal plans to take his family to Lonavala when Babita does not invite him to her birthday party.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya excitedly rush to get the perfect gift for Babita's birthday party. Babita and Iyer's grand party begins in full swing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya reach right on time for Babita's bash and learn that they failed to get the perfect gift for her. Champaklal attends the party and feels horrified to find Daya in a dress.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal, with a bucket in hand, slyly makes his way to Taarak's house to get some warm water. On the other hand, Taarak asks Abdul to buy him some delicious breakfast in Anjali's absence.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Jethalal insists on carrying a gas cylinder alone, he struggles to take the heavy object home. Later, his shoes get ruined leading Daya to hand him a pair of ladies sandals.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita's friend visits her with a special job offer as a swimming coach. Meanwhile, Jethalal's attempt to buy a new pair of shoes fails and he ends up with a pair of ladies' sandals.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita accepts a job offer as a swimming instructor and invites all the ladies to learn swimming from her. But when they inform their husbands, they all receive mixed reactions.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Jethalal discovers that Babita's swimming classes are only accessible to ladies, he approaches Taarak for a solution. The following day, Jethalal reaches the pool to learn swimming from Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Jethalal feels desperate to learn swimming from Babita, he approaches her to seek permission. Later, the ladies set off to the Silver club for their first swimming lesson with Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After a successful first swimming lesson, the women feel exhausted. But an excited Daya narrates her experience to Jethalal, who gets jealous and vows to learn swimming from Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: On a holiday, the men of Gokuldham decide to join the ladies for a swimming session. Meanwhile, Jethalal tries to look for ways to slyly enter the club and learn how to swim from Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal disguises himself to get a peek at Babita's swimming skills. Meanwhile, the other men of Gokuldham Society and Tapu Sena prepare to surprise the ladies at the Silver club.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While the ladies of Gokuldham feel surprised when the men and Tapu Sena arrive at Silver club, Jethalal is shocked. Hence, he tries to find a way to join in their fun.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tries to spend a romantic night with Daya but Champaklal keeps interrupting them. Later, Sunder arrives in Mumbai and disturbs Jethalal's peaceful sleep.
